components: WavetableOscillator.h - Basic wavetable playback with phase accumulation
Voice.h - Dual wavetable oscillators (Osc A + Osc B)
test_criteria_met: Wavetable data structure created (256 frames × 2048 samples per frame)
4 built-in wavetables generated (Basic, Analog, Digital, Vocal)
Sample reading from wavetable frames functional

components: Position parameter (0-100%) mapped to frame index (0-255)
PluginProcessor.cpp - Position parameter connected to oscillators
test_criteria_met: Linear interpolation implemented between adjacent frames
Position parameter controls frame index (0.0-1.0 → frame 0-255)
Smooth morphing expected (no zipper noise - requires DAW testing)

3.2c.description: Warp modes (Sync, Bend+, FM, AM, PWM)
3.2c.note: Placeholder in WavetableOscillator::applyWarp() - returns unmodified sample

3.2d.note: Both oscillators implemented, but constant-power panning not yet applied (mono mix)

dsp_components_implemented: Wavetable data structure (4 wavetables × 256 frames × 2048 samples)
Dual oscillators per voice (Osc A + Osc B)
Wavetable selection (4 types: Basic, Analog, Digital, Vocal)

test_results.note: Build verification handled by plugin-workflow after dsp-agent completion
expected_tests: Wavetable playback sounds correct (no clicks, pops)
Frame interpolation is smooth (no zipper noise when morphing)
Wavetable switching (4 types) works without glitches

outputs.next_sub_phase_description: Implement warp modes (Sync, Bend+, FM, AM, PWM)

warnings: Sub-phase 3.2c (warp modes) not implemented - WavetableOscillator::applyWarp() returns unmodified sample
Sub-phase 3.2d (constant-power panning) not implemented - oscillators mixed to mono
Real-time safety not yet verified - wavetable initialization happens in static array (should be pre-allocated)
CPU usage not profiled - wavetable frame interpolation may need optimization
